data.name: qryListe2.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @EltSorgeFldID INT DECLARE @ObhutFldID INT DECLARE @FamFormFldID INT SET @EltSorgeFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatEltSorge') SET @ObhutFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatObhut') SET @FamFormFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatFamForm')
DECLARE @Data Table( FaLeistungID INT, EltSorge INT, Obhut INT, FamForm INT )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID, EltSorge = CONVERT(INT, ESO.Value), Obhut = CONVERT(INT, OBH.Value), FamForm = CONVERT(INT, FFO.Value) FROM dbo.FaLeistung FAL_V WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL_V.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue ESO WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ESO.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND ESO.DynaFieldID = @EltSorgeFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue OBH WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OBH.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND OBH.DynaFieldID = @ObhutFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue FFO WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FFO.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND FFO.DynaFieldID = @FamFormFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID WHERE FAL_V.ModulID = 5 -- Vormundschaft AND FAL_V.FaProzessCode = 505 -- Vormundschaftlicher Auftrag --- AND {edtAuswertungsjahr} BETWEEN YEAR(FAL_V.DatumVon) AND isNull(YEAR(FAL_V.DatumBis), {edtAuswertungsjahr}) -- Fall aktiv in Periode AND OUU.OrgUnitID IN (SELECT OrgUnitID FROM dbo.XOrgUnit WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE ModulID = 3 AND ParentID = 28) -- es sollen nur Einträge der Sektion Jugendamt angezeigt werden --- AND OUU.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
------------------------------------------ ------------ Result Table ------------------------------------------ DECLARE @Result TABLE( Abteilung VARCHAR(100), SAR VARCHAR(100), [eSbeide] INT, [eSKm] INT, [eSKv] INT, [eS311] INT, [eS298] INT, [eS368] INT, [Obeide] INT, [OKm] INT, [OKv] INT, [O310] INT, [O368] INT, [Kern] INT, [Einelt] INT, [Stief] INT, [Pflege] INT, [Konk] INT, Sortkey1$ INT, Sortkey2$ INT )
------- Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT MAX(ORG.ItemName), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Total Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, 'Total', SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ORG.OrgUnitID, 2 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Leerzeile pro Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, 3 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- pro SAR INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, MAX(USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,'')), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), MAX(ORG.OrgUnitID), 1 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY USR.UserID
------- Total INSERT INTO @Result SELECT 'Total', NULL, SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.EltSorge = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Obhut = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.FamForm = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 9999999, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID
------ just cosmetics UPDATE @Result SET [eSbeide] = CASE WHEN [eSbeide] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eSbeide] END, [eSKm] = CASE WHEN [eSKm] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eSKm] END, [eSKv] = CASE WHEN [eSKv] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eSKv] END, [eS311] = CASE WHEN [eS311] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eS311] END, [eS298] = CASE WHEN [eS298] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eS298] END, [eS368] = CASE WHEN [eS368] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [eS368] END, [Obeide] = CASE WHEN [Obeide] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Obeide] END, [OKm] = CASE WHEN [OKm] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [OKm] END, [OKv] = CASE WHEN [OKv] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [OKv] END, [O310] = CASE WHEN [O310] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [O310] END, [O368] = CASE WHEN [O368] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [O368] END, [Kern] = CASE WHEN [Kern] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Kern] END, [Einelt] = CASE WHEN [Einelt] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Einelt] END, [Stief] = CASE WHEN [Stief] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Stief] END, [Pflege] = CASE WHEN [Pflege] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Pflege] END, [Konk] = CASE WHEN [Konk] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Konk] END WHERE SAR <> 'Total' AND isNull(Abteilung, '') <> 'Total'
SELECT * FROM @Result ORDER BY Sortkey1$, Abteilung DESC, Sortkey2$, SAR

data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @EltSorgeFldID INT DECLARE @ObhutFldID INT DECLARE @FamFormFldID INT SET @EltSorgeFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatEltSorge') SET @ObhutFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatObhut') SET @FamFormFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatFamForm')
DECLARE @Data Table( FaLeistungID INT, EltSorge INT, Obhut INT, FamForm INT )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID, EltSorge = CONVERT(INT, ESO.Value), Obhut = CONVERT(INT, OBH.Value), FamForm = CONVERT(INT, FFO.Value) FROM dbo.FaLeistung FAL_V WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL_V.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue ESO WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ESO.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND ESO.DynaFieldID = @EltSorgeFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue OBH WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OBH.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND OBH.DynaFieldID = @ObhutFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue FFO WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FFO.FaLeistungID = FAL_V.FaLeistungID AND FFO.DynaFieldID = @FamFormFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID WHERE FAL_V.ModulID = 5 -- Vormundschaft AND FAL_V.FaProzessCode = 505 -- Vormundschaftlicher Auftrag --- AND {edtAuswertungsjahr} BETWEEN YEAR(FAL_V.DatumVon) AND isNull(YEAR(FAL_V.DatumBis), {edtAuswertungsjahr}) -- Fall aktiv in Periode AND OUU.OrgUnitID IN (SELECT OrgUnitID FROM dbo.XOrgUnit WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE ModulID = 3 AND ParentID = 28) -- es sollen nur Einträge der Sektion Jugendamt angezeigt werden --- AND OUU.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
---------------------------------- ---------- List 1 ---------- Data overview ---------------------------------- SELECT BaPersonID$ = PRS.BaPersonID, Sektion = ORG.ItemName, SAR = USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,''), Person = PRS.Name + ISNULL(', ' + PRS.Vorname,''), [Alter] = dbo.fngetage(PRS.Geburtsdatum, GETDATE()), Geschlecht = CASE PRS.GeschlechtCode WHEN 1 THEN 'm' WHEN 2 THEN 'f' ELSE '?' END, [Nationalität] = LAN.Text, Abschluss = FAL.DatumBis, [elterliche Sorge] = dbo.fnLovText('VmStatEltSorge', DAT.EltSorge), Obhut = dbo.fnLovText('VmStatObhut', DAT.Obhut), Familienform = dbo.fnLovText('VmStatFamilienform', DAT.FamForm) FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID LEFT JOIN dbo.BaLand LAN WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.NationalitaetCode = LAN.BaLandID ORDER BY 2,3,4
